Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

description.en: When Theodore was dropped into a waterway by his half-brother, he suddenly recalled the memory of his past life. He had been a Japanese citizen known as Kirishima Kagehisa, placed inside VRMMO character he had made in Break Force Online. "Theodore" is a Combat Mage that Kagehisa played within BFO, and he realized his skills were progressing well even in this other world. Theodore, who had lightly brushed off his half-brother to make his own place in the world, had ventured off to the large labyrinth existing at the Boundary City, Termuilles.

May the Holy One Come Early

description.en:
On the order of the High Priest, the holy kingdom’s inquisitor, “McClat” captures the wicked great witch, ‘Vienny’. Vienny, on the other hand, promises him she would assist him in his quest for the other witches. Although Vienny appears to be terrified in his presence, she is unconcerned about the witches' cleansing. McClat's sentiments and ideas get increasingly muddled with her presence...

**Note:** *The webtoon released as R15; it's not R19 like the novel.*

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

description.en:
He was my best friend in the world. 
And that was enough.

Taesung and Wooyoung became best friends by chance when they were young.

Their friendship seemed to continue, even as they went to high school, but Wooyoung feels the desire to be more than just friends with Taesung.

Meanwhile, Taesung has become wary of Suhwa, who had become close to Wooyoung in high school. And an incident between Taesung and Suhwa causes a falling out between him and Wooyoung.

The two of them end up going to the same university without repairing the relationship. 

In order to rid himself of his feelings for Taesung, Wooyoung decides to cut off all contact and enlist in the army.  But he still struggles with his feelings.

After his military service, with Suhwa’s help, Wooyoung moves into an officetel, where he coincidentally reunites with Taesung…

The unrequited love which had started fresh and pure, had become gradually more intense as time passed.
Kwon Wooyoung felt like he was dying to have Go Taesung.

Kim Jeonji, a problem child who caused violence every day while in school, injured his leg in a motorcycle accident, retired from active duty (?), and is living a good life as a social misfit. Then, one day, he gets into an argument with the old beggar on the overpass, and he does something against the old beggar.... The old man is supposed to be a 'God'?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

description.en: Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.

title.en: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke

altTitles.en: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

altTitles.ja: ないしょのストーカーさん

description.en:
Kadoya is a resilient, hardworking, and gentle person, so he’s often pushed to do a lot of work.
He has this certain “secret”.
He is living strangely with someone he can't see.
When he comes home completely exhausted, there’s a hot bath and meal prepared for him.
And at night…
—— “He” comes to his side and holds him.
Kadoya feels so perfectly supported in everything, from housework to letting our sexual frustrations that it feels like he can’t live without “him” anymore...!

description.de: Seit dem Tod ihres Bruders, lebt die 17-jährige Shino Kishibe mit der Witwe Ehefrau ihres Bruders, Nozomi. Nozomi möchte ein Person sein, an die sich Shino anlehnen kann, während Shino entschlossen dazu ist, ihr keine Bürde zu sein. Zusammen versuchen die verwaiste Oberschülerin und die junge Witwe sich gegenseitig zu unterstützen, während ihre Leben normal weitergehen.
description.en:
Since the death of her brother, seventeen year-old Shino Kishibe has been living with her sister-in-law Nozomi. Nozomi wants to be a person Shino can lean on, while Shino is determined not to be a burden. Together the orphaned high-schooler and young widow try to support one another while carrying on with their everyday lives.  
  


---
description.fr: Après la mort de son frère, Shino Kishibe doit vivre avec sa belle-soeur, Nozomi. Ensemble, elles apprendront à communiquer, à se faire confiance mutuellement et surtout à faire le deuil.
description.id: Shino Kishibe, seorang gadis yatim piatu tinggal bersama Kakak iparnya, Nozomi, semenjak Kakak kandungnya meninggal. Shino dan Nozomi menjalani hari-harinya dengan saling menguatkan satu sama lain.
description.ko: 키시베 시노, 고교생. 17세. 부모님이 돌아가신 뒤 유일한 가족이었던 오빠도 6개월 전 세상을 떠났습니다. 지금 저는 '오빠의 아내'인 '노조미 씨'와 살고 있습니다. 「타인이지만 가족」. 그런 두 사람의 조금은 불가사의하고, 서투르고, 조금은 행복을 깨닫게 하는 일상 감성 스토리.
description.ru: "Мои родители умерли давным-давно: погибли в автокатастрофе. После этого мы с братом жили вдвоем, до тех пор пока он…"

description.en:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, she makes an unexpected proposal. "Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

There are thousands of evil spirits in the world, half of whom reside in the city of Shining Night. As for the remaining half, all of them died in the Northern Region of Canglang, which was held by the Heavenly Host, Xiao Fu Xuan. The only devil who had been imprisoned for 25 years is still alive. And, it is Wu Xing Xue, the Lord of Shining Night City.

His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

altTitles.ja: 紅椿妃

description.en: Kisshouin Tsubaki aka the "Crimson Camellia" wants to satisfy her occultistic curiosity by having a hands-on experience with every Yokai she can find.  Let's follow her in her travels, accompanied by her trusted cameraman Yokomizo-kun.
description.es:
Kisshouin Tsubaki alias la "Camelia Carmesí", una bella reportera de lo oculto, quiere satisfacer su curiosidad intelectual teniendo una experiencia práctica con cada Yokai que pueda encontrar.  
Sígala en sus viajes, acompañada por su confiable camarógrafo Yokomizo-kun.

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: ウィンター・ウルフ

description.en:
Is it safe to fall in love with you?
After losing her family to the revolt, noblewoman Lysithea hires Taron, a strapping young broker, to help her flee the kingdom. But when a heavy snowstorm strands the bickering pair in an eerie abandoned mansion, Lysithea has no choice but to rely on her new partner. What dangerous romance awaits them?
description.pl:
Można się w tobie bezpiecznie zakochać?
Po stracie rodziny w wyniku rewolty, szlachcianka Lysithea zatrudnia Tarona, młodego maklera, aby pomógł jej uciec z królestwa. Ale kiedy ciężka burza śnieżna zatrzymuje kłótliwą parę w niesamowitej opuszczonej rezydencji, Lysithea nie ma wyboru i musi polegać na swoim nowym partnerze. Jaki niebezpieczny romans ich czeka?

altTitles.th: นางร้ายต้องสังหาร

description.en:
Eris Miserian just wants to die.

Being overworked and underappreciated in the real world wasn’t great, but living as the villainess in a romance novel is even worse. If Eris can die in the novel, she might be able to return to reality, but the story won’t let her. Desperate to escape a life as the protagonist’s tormentor, she sets off on a journey with the help of a witch, a knight, and a high priest. Can she find her way back to her friends and family, or is Eris doomed to a fictional future?

---

description.ru:
Она перевоплотилась в злодейку из романа.  
Эрис испила яд, когда ее бывший жених, наследный принц, женился на ее подруге детства, служанке Елене. Когда я осознала, что произошло, у меня появилась только одна цель: сбежать из этого вымышленного мира. Но мир не позволил, и мне пришлось измениться. Это привело к тому, что те, кто игнорировал оригинальную Эрис, вдруг стали выпрашивать внимания и ласки у "новой" ее.  
— Кто ты? — спросил святой, который лелеял Елену.  
— Ты… ты действительно Эрис? — спросил воин, который поклялся в вечной верности Елене.  
— …Ты изменилась, — сказал даже принц, который отверг оригинальную Эрис ради Елены.  
Это странно. Все вы никогда не интересовались Эрис, так почему делаете это сейчас? Но даже так, я не стану привязываться, сколько бы времени ни прошло. Я никогда не полюблю этот мир.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A3%BD%EC%97%AC-%EC%A4%98/54115473)

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...

altTitles.ja: 不揃いの連理

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

altTitles.ja: 不揃いの連理

description.en:
Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?  
  
- [Part 1 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1030773596430327808)
- [Part 2 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1044057437831979008)
- [Part 3 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1065586182698889216)

Shin Jae-Won attended the World Camp hosted by the Spanish King as a tennis player in his Junior Year.  
  
Jae-Won meets Javier, an unusually conspicuous participant in the World Camp.  
  
“When are we going to practice?”  
  
There are always people (especially women) around him.  
  
Then, Jae-Won, who happened to stumble upon Javier one night during practice, ended up spending the night alone. The more he faced his whimsical, pure side, the more his heart began to beat…  
  
“I hate this kind of things…”  
  
Jae-Won’s first love ended as fast as a Siesta.  
  
A decade later, they meet again Spain.

Mismatched lovers Eunsung and Hyunwoo face a bizarre twist of fate. When Hyunwoo abruptly ends their relationship, Eunsung finds himself committing the darkest of crimes. However, Eunsung wakes up in a world where the cold body in his arms isn’t Hyunwoo’s and instead, he’s the one who's been killed… In this surreal switch, Eunsung realizes a chilling truth—their destinies are entwined in a dark cycle of love and murder. Despite this deadly paradox, Eunsung still believes they are meant to be together, and this time he won’t let anything get in his way…
A series of slice-of-life 4koma strips featuring the characters from the popular mobile game Twisted Wonderland.

In the office, Taejoon reigns supreme as the "Cupid of Sales," renowned for successfully pairing colleagues thanks to his ability to see the color of people's auras. Unfortunately, he himself has been single his entire life. But everything changes when he drunkenly kisses the new recruit, Hongyeon, which leads to a sizzling night at a motel. And then Taejoon discovers something fascinating - Hongyeon's aura is a mesmerizing rainbow! As Hongyeon boldly pursues him, Taejoon's shyness clashes with their steamy connection. Now they must navigate a somewhat clumsy and spicy office romance, where colors will fly in more ways than one!

title.en: Destroy It All And Love Me In Hell!

altTitles.ja: ぜんぶ壊して地獄で愛して

description.en:
Kurumi Yoshizawa, the student council president, has excellent grades and an inviting, friendly personality… on the surface at least. In reality, her days are spent struggling against her domineering mother and agonizing over her teachers’ expectations.

One day, Kurumi reluctantly goes to meet Naoi, her truant classmate, at her homeroom teacher’s request to look after her. The situation sours quickly as Naoi sees through Kurumi’s facade and makes her animosity clear. On the verge of a meltdown, Kurumi is barely able to stop herself from shoplifting, unaware that she’s being recorded by Naoi…

This is a violent story about two young girls struggling every day with no escape.
description.pl:
Kurumi Yoshizawa, przewodnicząca samorządu uczniowskiego, otwarta, ambitna, życzliwa... a przynajmniej na taką się kreuje. Rzeczywistość wygląda jednak mniej rózowo - w szkole musi zmagać się z nadmiernymi oczekiwaniami nauczycieli, a w domu czeka na nią toksyczna matka.

Pewnego dnia Kurumi, na prośbę wychowawcy, udaje się do Naoi, swojej wagarującej koleżanki z klasy. Sprawy przybierają zupełnie niespodziewany obrót, gdy Naoi dostrzega fasadę Kurumi i jasno wyraża swoją wrogość wobec niej. Będąc na skraju załamania nerwowego, Kurumi powstanawia dokonać drobnej kradzieży, przed czym w ostatniej chwili się powstrzymuje. Nie ma pojęcia, że całe te zajście nagrała Naoi.

To brutalna opowieść o dwóch młodych dziewczynach, które każdego dnia zmagają się z codziennością, od której nie mogą się wyrwać.
description.uk:
Вітайте, Йошізава Курумі – відмінниця, розумниця, красуня, президент школи та просто дуже гарна дівчинка!.. Принаймні такою вона себе показує людям. Реальність прозаїчніша: жорстокі методи виховання матері, відсутність будь-якого вільного часу, море стресу та щира відраза до всіх навколо.
І як часто буває з такими «відмінницями» – накипіло. «Що, якщо я це вкраду? Мене спіймають? Може, тоді цей жах нарешті скінчиться?» – стоїть і думає Курумі, не усвідомлюючи, що її спроба крадіжки записується на відео. Проте її знімають не камери відеоспостереження крамниці, а телефон Наой.
Наой – це дівчина, яка за словами не слідкує, до школи не ходить та обожнює ставити «відмінниць» на місце. Вона бачить абсолютно все крізь маску Курумі, погрожуючи показати відео однокласникам. Для Наой це був хіба що спосіб розвіяти нудьгу та провчити лицемірку… Допоки вона не починає бачити в Курумі лиш одне, але чисте та справжнє спільне бажання.

description.pl: Od gotowania, przez sprzątanie, po wszystko pomiędzy, Ha-yeon jest idealną pomocą domową! Jest tylko jeden problem... Woojin, który zarabia na życie tłumacząc powieści erotyczne, ciągle widzi swoją gorącą pomoc domową w swoich fantazjach! Może to tylko brak doświadczenia Woojina w sypialni sprawia, że jest sfrustrowany seksualnie, ale musi zająć się tą sytuacją, zanim sprawy wymkną się spod kontroli. Stary przyjaciel Woojina, złośliwy Sol, wysyła mu coś, aby spróbować mu pomóc, ale kiedy Ha-yeon przyłapuje Woojina w najbardziej kompromitującej pozycji z prezentem, czy to szokujące odkrycie będzie zbyt dużym obciążeniem dla nich obojga, aby je udźwignąć?

description.en: Amamiya Hiroto is unlucky. His life consisted of misfortune after misfortune, culminating in an unlucky death during an incident on a school boat trip, trying to save a girl he barely knew. After death, he met a god of reincarnation who requested that the hundred or so dead passengers - one of them being the girl he tried in vain to save - be reincarnated into another world. Yet a series of unfortunate events forced Hiroto to reincarnate with even less luck than before, starting with nothing but a tremendous amount of Mana. His second life, far worse than his first, came to a cruel end. However, upon meeting the god a second time, he was informed that there would be yet another reincarnation, one that had already been set in motion and could not be stopped. Not wanting Hiroto to endure a third life filled with suffering, the god cursed him before he was reborn in the hopes that he would either die quickly or commit suicide. Hiroto was reborn once more as a half-vampire, half-dark elf. A dhampir. Not wanting a fourth life, he is determined to live this third life with the only things remaining from his previous lives - Death Magic and his enormous Mana pool.
description.fa:
امامیا هیروتو یه بدبخته بدشانسه که تو اردو مدرسش به کشتیشون حمله میشه و در راه نجات دختری که حتی نمیشناسش میمیره، بعد مرگش خدا رو میبینه که میخواد تمام کسایی که داخل حادثه ی کشتی مردن رو به یه دنیای دیگه تناسخ کنه
به هرحال بعد کلی بدبختی و بدشانسی اون زندگی دومش رو با مقدار زیادی مانا شروع کرد ولی زندگی دومش حتی بدتر از زندگیه اولش به پایان رسید
به هرحال بعد مرگ دومش دوباره خدارو دید و خدا بهش گفت که زندگیه سومی هم درکاره ولی خدا نمیخواست تو زندگی سومش دوباره بدبختی و زجر رو تحمل کنه برای همین اونو نفرین کرد که یا سریع بمیره یا خودکشی کنه
این دفه هیروتو به عنوان یه دامپیر تناسخ کرد و قصد نداره یه زندگیه چهارم رو تجربه کنه برای همین با چیزایی که از زندگی های قبلیش داره یعنی مانای خیلی زیاد و جادوی مرگ میخواد کارای ناتمومش رو تموم کنه
description.ru:
Главному герою Амамия Хирото не везёт. Его жизнь состоит из цепочки неудач и в конце концов он умирает вследствие несчастного случая на корабле во время школьной экскурсии, погибнув при попытке спасти девушку, которую он едва знал. После смерти он встречает Бога Реинкарнации, которому требуются около ста мертвых пассажиров — среди которых девушка, которую он безуспешно пытался спасти — для перерождения в другом мире. Однако череда несчастливых событий вынуждает Хирото переродиться с ещё меньшей удачей, чем раньше, не имея в начале пути ничего, кроме огромного количества маны. Его вторая жизнь, что была гораздо хуже первой, приводит его к жестокому концу. Несмотря на это, встретившись с Богом в третий раз, он узнает, что будет и третья реинкарнация – она уже запущена и не может быть отменена. Не желая, чтобы Хирото вновь претерпевал жизнь, полную страданий, перед его перерождением Бог проклинает его, в надежде, что Хирото либо умрет быстро, либо совершит самоубийство. На сей раз Хирото переродился как наполовину вампир, наполовину тёмный эльф – дампир. Желая избежать четвёртой реинкарнации, он настроен прожить третью жизнь со способностями, что достались ему от предыдущих – Магией Смерти и Бассейном Маны.  
  
  


---

Dorothea Milanaire, who was once the tyrant of the Ubera Empire, wound up being hated by the one she loved and was executed. However... after she opened her eyes, she found herself back in her childhood?! Believing this to be her chance, she resolved to live virtuously in this life. Can she repent her past life as a tyrant and live virtuously in her new life...?!

description.ko:
폭군님은 갱생 중! 

제국 우베라의 폭군이었던 도로테아 밀라네어. 

눈앞의 모든 것을 제거하며, 빼앗고 탐욕스럽게 먹어 치우는 '악'이었던 그녀는 
결국 사랑하는 사람에게 미움받고 처형을 당하고 만다. 

그런데... 눈을 뜨니 어린 시절로 되돌아왔다?!  

혹시 이건 악과 후회로 얼룩진 인생을 되돌릴 수 있는 기회가 아닐까? 

이번 생의 목표는 착하게 사는 것. 
과연 도로테아는 폭군이었던 과거를 청산하고 새로운 삶에서 착하게 살아갈 수 있을까...?! 

폭군님의 인생을 건 갱생이 시작된다!

description.uk:
Доротея Міланір - тиранка імперії Убера, яка була ненависна тому, кого кохала, хоча все своє існування відчайдушно прохала про взаємну любов. Однак... Розплющивши очі, героїня розуміє, що повернулася в дитинство. "Здається, це мій шанс!". Вона ставить собі за мету прожити гідне життя. Чи вдасться їй позбутися своєї минулої тиранічної суті та нарешті жити щасливо?

description.en: Even angels give into temptation. Once God’s right-hand warrior, the archangel Agnes has succumbed to desire and formed a contract with Lucifer, the ruler of demons. Now a fallen angel, she poses as a simple taxi driver and patrols the bustling city of Seoul during the midnight hours. Cursed by the king of hell to seek souls for her life force, Agnes pursues depraved individuals who prey upon innocents for their own pleasure, and uses their carnal desires against them. But when her past comes back to haunt her, a tantalizing game of cat and mouse involving vengeful entities ensues.
This is a collection of some cute animal stories.

Lee Jungwoo is the member of an unpopular idol group <Sweet Devils>, with the stage name 'Lucifer'. Despite accepting all kinds of programmes and odd jobs in the hopes to make it big someday, his one claim to fame turns out to be an unfortunate accident on live-tv. Misunderstandings ensue and suddenly he finds himself entangled with national superstar, Kang Kwonjun.

description.en: A robust and naive mercenary, Ilrick, accidentally killed the son of the leader of his unit, who was after Ilrick's body. After he believed that he had successfully concealed his crimes, Ilrick received the summon of an unexpected individual. With flowing silver hair, the individual was the most handsome man Ilrick had ever seen in his life- the Grand Duke of Miros. The duke graced a chillingly beautiful smile on his face as he spoke to Ilrick. "Isn't it only correct for you to be the one asking me to fuck you up?"

description.en: Teenage magician Kaito Kuroba has a secret identity: that of Kaitou Kid, a famous internationally-known and wanted "phantom thief". Kaito took the identity after one day discovering that his late father was the original Kaitou Kid. Later on, he discovers his father, who died from an 'accident' during a magic trick, was really murdered because he would not steal the jewel Pandora for an evil organization. As Kaitou Kid, Kaito tries to find Pandora before that organization that killed his father do, and destroy it, leading Inspector Nakamori and his taskforce on the wildest jewel heists imaginable!
description.ja: 世紀の宝物を予告通りに手中し、闇から闇へと消え去る紳士・怪盗キッド！！見事なマジックで名刑事らの裏をかき、目指すは「正義」の完全犯罪！！今宵、神出鬼没の彼が狙う宝石は、時価4億円の「月の瞳」だ！！

description.en:
A miserable life where even dreams of love were out of reach. 
The night I tried to end my life from the exhaustion of my joyless marriage, a special invitation arrived unexpectedly.

[ You are an existence that gleams like the jewels.
The Jewel Box, where existences who shine like you gather... 
Would you like to enter the Jewel Box? YES? or NO? ]

[ The Empire's Jewel Box ] is a luxurious party attended by only the most outstanding people. A place where they can meet a marriage partner solely based on "true love" while concealing their face and status.
"If you were granted the opportunity to become a shining Jewel, like those who were specially selected..."

My choice from that night changed everything.

However, as Minami sees her friend get confessed to, feelings in her own heart start to sprout. A romantic comedy of two childhood friend starts.

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.

Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en: Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan
description.ja: 時は西暦1600年。“織田信長”が全国統一してから10年が経過していた――。信長は自分の死期を悟ると、最強の武芸者を輩出したものに“この国”を譲ると発表。天下統一の夢破れた武将たちは、それぞれ最強の武芸者を擁立し、この国の王を目指す！
description.vi:
Một câu chuyện với một chuỗi lịch sử hoàn toàn lạ lẫm với lịch sử mà chúng ta đã và đang từng được biết.
Oda Nobugana, sau khi hoàn thành đại nghiệp thống nhất thiên hạ, nay chỉ vì muốn nhìn thấy cảnh chém giết đổ máu, đã lập nên một giải đấu nhằm chọn ra người sẽ thay mình trị vì cả thiên hạ, "TENKAICHI". Để tham gia, những văn võ bá quan lẫn các trung thần đều sẽ chọn ra cho mình một võ sĩ đại diện, người mà họ cho rằng sẽ là thiên hạ đệ nhất võ sĩ tham gia thi đấu cho mình. Một đại hội đẫm máu và tàn khốc chưa từng có trong lịch sử Nhật Bản chính thức bắt đầu.
description.es-la: Torneo de batalla ambientado en la Era Sengoku. Es el año 1600. Han pasado diez años desde que Oda Nobunaga unificó Japón. Cuando Nobunaga se dio cuenta de que se estaba muriendo, anunció que entregaría el país a quien produjera los guerreros más fuertes. Los señores de la guerra, cuyos sueños de unificar el país se habían visto frustrados, crearon sus propios guerreros más fuertes y pusieron sus miras en convertirse en el gobernante de Japón
description.pt-br: “Quem é o artista marcial mais forte do Japão?” É 1600 D.C., dez anos se passaram desde que "Oda Nobunaga" unificou todo o país. Percebendo sua morte, Nobunaga anuncia que entregará 'este país' àquele que tivesse como seguidor o artista marcial mais forte.

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”  
  
As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.

Recently, Siwon has been lively. This is because he has fallen inlove with Soyoung, a therapist he had met after receiving physiotherapy. Siwon has appeared quite a few times in front of Soyoung, but Soyoung doesn't give out affection easily. Siwon, who is faced with constant rejection, always keeps a smile on his face. This makes Soyoung look at him with an unknown smile on his face.

description.en:
Dungeons and monsters suddenly appear and the world falls into chaos. Kim Ki-Bong, an ordinary young part-timer, has been sucked up into an awakening dimension for 3000 years to train his powers.

When he makes his return to reality, he is a max-leveled player who only has one wish - to reconcile with his loved ones. 10 years have passed in the real world during his absence.

How will Ki-Bong be able to find his place in the world with his new limit-breaking abilities?

Enfin libéré du test, le joueur découvre que seulement 10 ans se sont écoulés dans la réalité, et que le monde est devenu un enfer total envahi par les monstres. Avec toutes ses capacités au niveau max, Kibong parviendra-t-il à sauver l’humanité de ces affreuses créatures ?

アパートの狭いキッチンに悩む料理好きの女子大生・風香が出会ったのは、料理が苦手で破天荒なアウトドア女子・よもぎだった。
成り行きで始まったたふたりのおそとごはんは、なんだかとっても温かくて…
女ふたりの助け合いアウトドアグルメ漫画スタート！

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女と体が入れ替わったけれど、私は今日も元気に暮らしています！

altTitles.en: I Swapped Bodies With a Wicked Witch, But Today I'll Keep Having Fun!

description.en: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
description.ja: 取り決めにより雪の国・スニューウから大国・ジルヴァラに輿入れしてきた王女・マリエッタ。しかし魔法が使えないマリエッタは塔に幽閉され、7年後に行われる聖獣召喚の儀式を成功させるため、ひたすら魔法の修行を強いられた。そして7年後見事に白い竜を召喚したマリエッタだが、次の瞬間謎の声にいざなわれ、気がつけば見知らぬ場所にいた。しかも見た目はそっくりなのに、どんな魔法も使えるほど魔力に溢れた身体になっていて…。

description.en:
A standard parachuting drill turns deadly for Commander Kang San and Lieutenant Kim Biyeon when they land in a mysterious dimension filled with bloodthirsty monsters! The only help they have comes in the form of mysterious texts and rewards for completing missions.

As the two soldiers push themselves to their limits to survive, they unlock mysterious abilities that are powerful beyond their control.

Can they learn to harness these powers to stay alive and make it out of this twisted game?
